WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please re-open this if you can provide more information or steps to reproduce the issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Whenever I try to install typescript msi it starts up but just sits there with no progress bar or anything saying it is installed or working to install.  

Now, however, I believe I have set up all of the updates for VS and when I go to start a new project webpage I can see the typescript.  

My question is how do I know if I have it installed and if so how can I check the version? I just installed VS today.
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript 8.2.0 Installer just seems to Just sit there

Comments.Message:
- Have you tried restarting your system?

- Do you have administrator rights? They are required for installing the TypeScript extension.

- Go to `Tools/Extension and Updates` in VS in order to see the installed extensions.

If you have installed the extension correctly, there will still be the possibility that it isn't installed yet ;)
Follow the instructions described here for manual installation (**very easy**): http://stackoverflow.com/a/12687882/603003

In addition to the previous comments, make sure you did not miss a UAC prompt that the installer is waiting on before proceeding. Assuming none of those things fix your issue, could you specify which versions of Windows and Visual Studio you're using?
